bibl.title: Things can only get better for Socrates and his crocodile: how onomastics can benefit from digital humanities
bibl.seg: Yanne Broux, Things can only get better for Socrates and his crocodile: how onomastics can benefit from Digital Humanities.
Studying personal names from Graeco-Roman Egypt. - Finding Socrates. - Socrates in time… - … and space. - Socrates and the crocodile: a perfect match? - The future of onomastic research.
